l2-guidelines.english: Guidelines for Prompting
l2-guidelines.chinese: 提示词指南

l2-guidelines.english: In this lesson, you'll practice two prompting principles and their related tactics in order to write effective prompts for large language models.
l2-guidelines.chinese: 在本节课程中，您将练习两个提示词原则及其相关技巧，以便为大型语言模型编写有效的提示词。

l2-guidelines.english: Setup
l2-guidelines.chinese: 设置

l2-guidelines.english: Load the API key and relevant Python libaries.
l2-guidelines.chinese: 加载 API 密钥和相关的 Python 库。

l2-guidelines.english: In this course, we've provided some code that loads the OpenAI API key for you.
l2-guidelines.chinese: 在本课程中，我们为您提供了一些加载 OpenAI API 密钥的代码。

l2-guidelines.english: helper function
l2-guidelines.chinese: 辅助函数

l2-guidelines.english: Throughout this course, we will use OpenAI's
l2-guidelines.chinese: 在整个过程中，我们将使用 OpenAI 的

l2-guidelines.english: model and the
l2-guidelines.chinese: 模型和

l2-guidelines.english: chat completions endpoint
l2-guidelines.chinese: 聊天完成端点

l2-guidelines.english: This helper function will make it easier to use prompts and look at the generated outputs:
l2-guidelines.chinese: 这个辅助函数将让使用提示词更加容易，并可查看模型所生成的输出：

l2-guidelines.english: Prompting Principles
l2-guidelines.chinese: 提示词原则

l2-guidelines.english: Principle 1: Write clear and specific instructions
l2-guidelines.chinese: 原则 1：写清晰和具体的指令

l2-guidelines.english: Principle 2: Give the model time to “think”
l2-guidelines.chinese: 原则 2：给模型一些“思考”的时间

l2-guidelines.english: Tactics
l2-guidelines.chinese: 技巧

l2-guidelines.english: Tactic 1: Use delimiters to clearly indicate distinct parts of the input
l2-guidelines.chinese: 技巧 1：使用分隔符清楚地区分输入的提示词的不同部分

l2-guidelines.english: Delimiters can be anything like: ```, """, < >,
l2-guidelines.chinese: 分隔符可以是任何字符，例如：```, """, < >,

l2-guidelines.english: Tactic 2: Ask for a structured output
l2-guidelines.chinese: 技巧 2：要求模型进行结构化输出

l2-guidelines.english: Tactic 3: Ask the model to check whether conditions are satisfied
l2-guidelines.chinese: 技巧 3：要求模型检查是否满足条件

l2-guidelines.english: Tactic 4: "Few-shot" prompting
l2-guidelines.chinese: 技巧 4："少量样本"提示词

l2-guidelines.english: Principle 2: Give the model time to “think”
l2-guidelines.chinese: 原则 2：给模型一些“思考”的时间

l2-guidelines.english: Tactic 1: Specify the steps required to complete a task
l2-guidelines.chinese: 技巧 1：指定完成任务所需的步骤

l2-guidelines.english: Ask for output in a specified format
l2-guidelines.chinese: 要求以指定的格式输出回答

l2-guidelines.english: Tactic 2: Instruct the model to work out its own solution before rushing to a conclusion
l2-guidelines.chinese: 技巧 2：指导模型在匆忙得出结论之前，先制定自己的解决方案

l2-guidelines.english: Note that the student's solution is actually not correct.
l2-guidelines.chinese: 注意：学生的解决方案实际上不是正确的。

l2-guidelines.english: We can fix this by instructing the model to work out its own solution first.
l2-guidelines.chinese: 我们可以通过指导模型先制定自己的解决方案来解决这个问题。

l2-guidelines.english: Model Limitations: Hallucinations
l2-guidelines.chinese: 模型的局限性：幻觉

l2-guidelines.english: Boie is a real company, the product name is not real.
l2-guidelines.chinese: Boie是一家现实中的公司，但这里提到的产品是虚构的。

l2-guidelines.english: Try experimenting on your own!
l2-guidelines.chinese: 试着自己做一些实验吧！

l2-guidelines.english: Notes on using the OpenAI API outside of this classroom
l2-guidelines.chinese: 在课堂之外使用 OpenAI API 的注意事项

l2-guidelines.english: To install the OpenAI Python library:
l2-guidelines.chinese: 安装 OpenAI Python 库：

l2-guidelines.english: The library needs to be configured with your account's secret key, which is available on the
l2-guidelines.chinese: 该库需要使用您帐户的密钥进行配置，该密钥可在

l2-guidelines.english: website
l2-guidelines.chinese: OpenAI 网站中找到

l2-guidelines.english: You can either set it as the
l2-guidelines.chinese: 您可以将密钥设置为

l2-guidelines.english: environment variable before using the library:
l2-guidelines.chinese: 环境变量，然后再使用该库：

l2-guidelines.english: Or, set
l2-guidelines.chinese: 或者，将

l2-guidelines.english: to its value:
l2-guidelines.chinese: 变量设置为密钥的值：

l2-guidelines.english: A note about the backslash
l2-guidelines.chinese: 关于反斜杠“\”的说明

l2-guidelines.english: In the course, we are using a backslash
l2-guidelines.chinese: 在本课程中，我们使用反斜杠

l2-guidelines.english: to make the text fit on the screen without inserting newline '\n' characters.
l2-guidelines.chinese: 来表示换行，以便于长文本提示词在屏幕上能够完整显示，而无需插入换行符“\n”。

l2-guidelines.english: GPT-3 isn't really affected whether you insert newline characters or not.  But when working with LLMs in general, you may consider whether newline characters in your prompt may affect the model's performance.
l2-guidelines.chinese: 实际上，GPT-3 模型并不会因为您是否插入换行符而受到影响。但是，当您使用其他的大语言模型时，您可能需要考虑提示词中的换行符是否会影响模型的性能。

l3-iterative.english: In this lesson, you'll iteratively analyze and refine your prompts to generate marketing copy from a product fact sheet.
l3-iterative.chinese: 在本课中，您将迭代分析和完善您的提示词，以从产品概况表中生成营销副本。

l3-iterative.english: Generate a marketing product description from a product fact sheet
l3-iterative.chinese: 从产品概况表中生成营销产品描述

l3-iterative.english: Issue 1: The text is too long

l3-iterative.chinese: 限制单词/句子/字符的数量。

l3-iterative.english: Issue 2. Text focuses on the wrong details
l3-iterative.chinese: 问题 2：文本关注了错误的细节

l3-iterative.english: Ask it to focus on the aspects that are relevant to the intended audience.
l3-iterative.chinese: 要求模型关注与目标受众相关的方面。

l3-iterative.english: Issue 3. Description needs a table of dimensions
l3-iterative.chinese: 问题 3：描述需要一个尺寸表

l3-iterative.english: Ask it to extract information and organize it in a table.
l3-iterative.chinese: 要求模型提取信息并将其组织成表格。

l3-iterative.english: Load Python libraries to view HTML
l3-iterative.chinese: 加载 Python 库以查看 HTML 文档
试着自己做一些实验吧！
